content: a very cozy vest-ish shrug made to celebrate the university district street fair 2011 the original was made with plymouth trabajos del peru a heavy-worsted-weight yarn that knits to a bulky gauge quite nicely it is so soft and warm i ve made a second one with plymouth jeannee chunky for when the weather warms up a little bit the sizing is awkward yes the measurement is taken across the back of the piece because of the stretchy ribbing and the fact that the back also makes a little bit of a cap sleeve the size is very flexible but difficult to define i give the measurement as a guideline a french translation is now available with thanks to alpag 1 1 https //www ravelry com/people/alpag
